Extra: Have you ever owed taxes?
Translation2: 你是否曾欠稅？

Extra: Can you state your full name for me?
Translation2: 你能為我陳述你的全名嗎？

Extra: What is your current phone number?
Translation2: 你目前的電話號碼是多少？

Extra: Did you ever claim to be a U.S. citizen?
Translation2: 你是否曾聲稱自己是美國公民？

Extra: Have you ever registered to vote in any election?
Translation2: 你是否曾在任何選舉中登記投票？

Extra: Did you call yourself a non-resident on your taxes?
Translation2: 你在報稅時是否稱自己為非居民？

Extra: Have you filed your tax return last year?
Translation2: 你去年報稅了嗎？

Extra: I file the tax return every year.
Translation2: 我每年都會報稅。

Extra: Have you ever decided not to file a tax return because you considered yourself to be a nonresident?
Translation2: 你是否曾因為認為自己是非居民而決定不報稅？

Extra: Are you a member of any organization?
Translation2: 你是任何組織的成員嗎？

Extra: Have you ever been involved in any crimes?
Translation2: 你是否曾參與過任何犯罪活動？

Extra: Have you ever associated with any criminal groups?
Translation2: 你是否曾與任何犯罪集團有往來？

Extra: Have you ever engaged in any illegal activities?
Translation2: 你是否曾從事過任何非法活動？

Extra: Did you ever serve in the military?
Translation2: 你是否曾在軍隊中服役？

Extra: Have you ever participated in any illegal activities?
Translation2: 你是否曾參加過任何非法活動？

Extra: Where did you work in?
Translation2: 你在哪裡工作過？

Extra: Have you EVER volunteered in a place where people were detained?
Translation2: 你是否曾在關押人的場所擔任過志工？

Extra: Were you EVER a part of any group that used a weapon against any person?
Translation2: 你是否曾是任何對他人使用武器的團體的一員？

Extra: Did you ever sign up for election?
Translation2: 你曾登記參加選舉嗎？

Extra: Did you take part in any military training?
Translation2: 你參加過任何軍事訓練嗎？

Extra: Do you agree to take the full Oath of Allegiance?
Translation2: 你同意進行完整的效忠宣誓嗎？

Extra: Support means to agree with someone.
Translation2: 支持的意思是同意某人。

Extra: Have you ever tried to enter the United States illegally?
Translation2: 你是否曾嘗試非法進入美國？

Extra: Did you ever attempt to enter the U.S. illegally?
Translation2: 你是否曾嘗試非法進入美國？

Extra: If you change your address, you must tell us.
Translation2: 如果你更改地址，必須告知我們。

Extra: Have you ever attempted to procure a person for the purpose of prostitution?
Translation2: 你是否曾為了賣淫的目的試圖勾引某人？

Extra: Have you ever married someone in order to obtain an immigration benefit?
Translation2: 你是否曾為了獲得移民利益而與某人結婚？

Extra: Have you ever been married to more than one person at the same time?
Translation2: 你是否曾同時與超過一人維持婚姻關係？

Extra: Did you ever fail to pay your taxes?
Translation2: 你是否曾未能繳納稅款？

Extra: Have you EVER lied to any U.S. Government officials to gain entry or admission into the United States?
Translation2: 你是否曾為了進入或獲准進入美國而對美國政府官員撒謊？

Extra: Did you travel abroad after you applied for naturalization?
Translation2: 你在申請入籍後有出國旅行嗎？

Extra: Are you able to take the Oath of Allegiance?
Translation2: 你能進行效忠宣誓嗎？

Extra: Are you unable to take the Oath of Allegiance because of a physical or developmental disability or mental impairment?
Translation2: 你是否因為身體、發育殘疾或心理障礙而無法進行效忠宣誓？

Extra: Are you unable to take the Oath of Allegiance because of a physical or developmental disability or mental impairment?
Translation2: 你是否因為身體、發育殘疾或心理障礙而無法進行效忠宣誓？

Extra: Are you willing to bear arms for the U.S.?
Translation2: 你願意為美國拿起武器嗎？

Extra: Are you willing to carry weapons on behalf of the United States?
Translation2: 你願意代表美國攜帶武器嗎？

Extra: Sabotage means to damage on purpose.
Translation2: 破壞的意思是故意損壞。

Extra: I want to vote.
Translation2: 我想投票。

Extra: Please provide your previous address.
Translation2: 請提供您之前的地址。

Extra: Do you have any previous names?
Translation2: 你有過之前的名字（曾用名）嗎？

Extra: What was the reason of your last trip?
Translation2: 你上一次旅行的原因是什麼？

Extra: What is the reason for filing this form?
Translation2: 提交這份表格的原因是什麼？

Extra: Claim 聲稱
Register 登記
Vote 投票
Owe taxes 欠稅

Content: A title like King or Queen
Extra: Hereditary title 世襲頭銜

Communist Party 共產黨

Persecute 迫害

Content: To kill a lot of people
Extra: Genocide 種種滅絕

Arrested 被逮捕

Extra: Commit a crime 犯罪

Extra: Habitual drunkard 習慣性酗酒者
Illegal drugs 毒品

Deported 驅逐出境

Content: I am good, how are you?
During the interview, could you say slowly? Sometimes I can’t follow up.
Translation: 面試期間，您可以說慢一點嗎？有時我跟不上。

Content: Excuse me, could you say slowly?
Translation: 不好意思，可以請您說慢一點嗎？

Content: Sorry, could you say it again?
Translation: 抱歉，可以請您再說一遍嗎？

Content: I am here for my citizenship interview.
Translation: 我是來參加公民入籍面試的。

Content: I have been lawful permanent resident over five years.
Translation: 我成為合法永久居民已經超過五年了。

Content: I like America, and I want to vote.
Through my family. My sister sponsored me.
Translation: 透過我的家人。我姐姐贊助我的。

Content: My sister’s name is Sophia Shi, she became US citizen in April, 2000.
Translation: 我姐姐的名字是Sophia Shi，她在 2000 年4月成為美國公民。

Content: I am not Hispanic or Latino.
Translation: 我不是西班牙裔或拉丁裔。

Content: 2-1-O-2-O 23rd, Apartment1, Bayside, NY, 1,1,3,6O.    I lived there since April 2nd, 2024.
Translation: 210-20 23rd, Apt1, Bayside, NY, 11360。我從2024年4月2日起住在那裡。

Content: 4-8-6-O 206th street, Oakland Gardens, NY, 1,1,3,6,4, I lived there from April 2nd, 2016 to April 1st, 2024.
Translation: 4860 206th street, Oakland Gardens, NY, 11364。我從 2016年4月2日到 2024年4月1日住在那裡。

Content: My spouse is Qizhong Wu, he lives in China.
Translation: 我的配偶是吳啟忠，他住在中國。

Content: I work in Grace and Heart Home Care LLC, in Hamilton.
Translation: 我在漢密爾頓的 Grace and Heart Home Care LLC 工作。

Content: I work there more than one year. Since Jan 1st 2025.
Translation: 我在那裡工作了一年多。自 2025年1月1日起。

Content: I worked in JHC OT LLC, in Flushing.
Translation: 我曾在法拉盛的 JHC OT LLC 工作。

Content: I worked there from Jan 1st, 2019 to Dec 31st, 2024.
Translation: 我從2019年1月1日到 2024年12月31日在那裡工作。

Content: I went to Canada from Aug 28th to Sep 25th in 2022.
Translation: 我在2022年8月28日到9月25日去了加拿大。

Content: I went to Dominican from Jan 13th to Jan 16th in 2023.
Translation: 我在2023年1月13日到1月16日去了多明尼加。

Content: I went to Canada from Oct 24th to Nov 07th in 2023.
Translation: 我在2023年10月24日到11月7日去了加拿大。

Content: I went to China and Japan from Aug 21st to Nov 30th in 2024.
Translation: 我在2024年8月21日到11月30日去了中國和日本。
